mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.project_id, t.building_name, t.houses_num, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_project_building t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.project_id like concat('%',#{project_id},'%')
and t.building_name like concat('%',#{building_name},'%')
and t.houses_num like concat('%',#{houses_num},'%')
